sent.orig: In front of the Save-Rite Store on Fifth Street.
To alter a state, enter the changes and then click Save to commit the changes.
sent.trans: 若要改变一个状态，就输入变更然后点击保存按钮(Save)提交这些变更。

sent.orig: Save worry, Save power, Save money, Save time!
sent.trans: 为您省心、省力、省钱、省时是我们的不懈追求！

sent.orig: Do you want to save the current session and overwrite the selected save?
sent.trans: 您是否想要保存当前的游戏进度并覆盖选择的游戏进度？

sent.orig: Your friend car pool with you not to save gas but to save time.
sent.trans: 你的朋友跟你共乘一辆车不是为了省汽油而是为了省时间。
